title: Benghazi Suspect Arrives On American Soil To Face Charges
teaser: Ahmed Abu Khattala is the first person facing charges over the attack on a U.S. diplomatic post in Libya. NPR's Arun Rath talks with justice correspondent Carrie Johnson about his first day in court.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
